    • Class neuralnetwork.LayerArchitecture

      class LayerArchitecture extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • cols
          int cols
          Each row is meant to represent a node, and the number of columns is the number of weights in each node. The number of columns does not include the bias.

          Architecture networkArchitecture
          The architecture for this layer.
        • rows
          int rows
          Each row is meant to represent a node, and the number of columns is the number of weights in each node. The number of columns does not include the bias.
        • startIndex
          int startIndex
          Each row is meant to represent a node, and the number of columns is the number of weights in each node. The number of columns does not include the bias.
